actionConfiguration.body:
UPDATE public."patching_status" SET
		"complete_host" = '{{update_form.fieldState.complete_host.isVisible ? update_form.formData.complete_host : update_form.sourceData.complete_host}}',
		"start_on" = '{{update_form.fieldState.start_on.isVisible ? update_form.formData.start_on : update_form.sourceData.start_on}}',
    "task_trigger" = '{{update_form.fieldState.task_trigger.isVisible ? update_form.formData.task_trigger : update_form.sourceData.task_trigger}}',
		"completed_on" = '{{update_form.fieldState.completed_on.isVisible ? update_form.formData.completed_on : update_form.sourceData.completed_on}}',
		"rebooted_on" = '{{update_form.fieldState.rebooted_on.isVisible ? update_form.formData.rebooted_on : update_form.sourceData.rebooted_on}}',
		"message" = '{{update_form.fieldState.message.isVisible ? update_form.formData.message : update_form.sourceData.message}}'
WHERE "start_host" = {{data_table.selectedRow.start_host}};
